architectural_notes: Compute resident age from date_of_birth using date-only logic (avoid timezone/day shifting).

existing_features.title: Display each resident’s age on the Resident Dashboard cards, computed from the resident’s date of birth (resident.dob) and shown alongside the existing DOB field.

Implement a timezone-safe age calculation that does not shift the DOB by day due to local timezone/DST; compute using the DOB string’s year-month-day components rather than constructing a Date from an ISO datetime that can shift days.

new_feature_requests.summary: Show resident age in residents dashboard, computed from date of birth without day/time (timezone) shifting

projectName: Show resident age on Resident Dashboard (timezone-safe DOB computation)
